address: Xã Đức Giang, Thành phố Bắc Giang, Tỉnh Bắc Giang
thought:
**Finding the New Administrative Unit for the Old Address**

Okay, so I've got this old address, "Xã Đức Giang, Thành phố Bắc Giang, Tỉnh Bắc Giang," and I need to figure out where it is now. My understanding is that there's been some reorganization, and I'm pretty confident in tackling this.

First, I see "Tỉnh Bắc Giang," which is the province.  I immediately check the resolutions related to provincial mergers, specifically 60-NQ/TW.  Bingo! "Tỉnh Bắc Giang" is not on the "no change" list.  Further examination of that resolution set indicates a merger with "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh," creating "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh." That narrows down the search considerably.

Now, I shift my focus to "Xã Đức Giang," the ward. Time to check other relevant resolutions within the context of the new "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh". My primary targets are resolutions related to the restructuring of wards, specifically looking for any mentions of "Đức Giang."

Resolution 1656/NQ-UBTVQH15 has nothing to do with this and neither does 1665/NQ-UBTVQH15 nor 1671/NQ-UBTVQH15. However, 1658/NQ-UBTVQH15 for "Bắc Ninh" looks very promising. Line 64 specifically mentions "Xã Đức Giang," stating it will be merged with two other wards and become the new "Xã Đồng Việt". Further review of this same resolution highlights formation of a new "phường Bắc Giang", but this is formed from other wards, not "Đức Giang".

I'll cross-reference what I've found with the "New Wards" list and look for "xã Đồng Việt" within "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh." Perfect! I find an entry: `{"ward_code":"07735","ward_name":"Xã Đồng Việt","province_name":"Tỉnh Bắc Ninh"}`. This perfectly aligns with resolution 1658. There is a listing for "phường Bắc Giang" with the new province. However, given the context that the old ward is "Xã Đức Giang", this is not a suitable conclusion.

Based on all of this, my conclusion is pretty straightforward.  The old province, "Tỉnh Bắc Giang," is now part of "Tỉnh Bắc Ninh".  Specifically, "Xã Đức Giang" is explicitly mentioned in resolution 1658/NQ-UBTVQH15 as being merged into the new "Xã Đồng Việt". So, the new administrative unit for "Xã Đức Giang" is **Xã Đồng Việt, Tỉnh Bắc Ninh**, with a ward code of 07735. Confidence is high here due to a clear, direct mention of the name and the explicit mapping.

citation.header: 1658/NQ-UBTVQH15: Sắp xếp các đơn vị hành chính cấp xã của tỉnh Bắc Ninh
citation.line: 64. Sắp xếp toàn bộ diện tích tự nhiên, quy mô dân số của các xã Đức Giang, Đồng Phúc và Đồng Việt thành xã mới có tên gọi là xã Đồng Việt.
